text: Robert Henry Grey (July 17, 1891 - April 26, 1934) was an American film actor of the silent film era. He appeared in 53 films between 1911 and 1933. He was born in Oakland, California, and died in Los Angeles, California. ==Selected filmography== * The Twelfth Juror (1913) * Through the Neighbor's Window (1913) * Shadows and Sunshine (1916) * Spellbound (1916) as Graham * Mentioned in Confidence (1917) * Twin Kiddies (1917) * Bab the Fixer (1917) * All of a Sudden Norma (1919) * Speed (1922) * The Silent Partner (1923) ==External links== * Category:1891 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Male actors from California Category:American male film actors Category:American male silent film actors Category:20th-century American male actors
title: R. Henry Grey
